Configuring the Project
=======================

1. To launch the make command, go to File -> Preferences -> Settings.

..

   |image1|

Figure 16: Settings

2. Goto: Settings -> Extensions and select MakefileTools.

..

   |A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated|

Figure 17: Configuring the Makefile Tools extension

3. Enter the make file path in path setting

..

   |A screen shot of a computer Description automatically generated|

Figure 18: Applying the Makefille path

4. Select MakeFile extension in the activity bar and set Build target as
   [all].

|A screenshot of a computer program Description automatically generated|

Figure 19: Makefile Tools extension - Build target

5. Click on the Build icon available in the Extension window. This will
   launch the make and generate the ELF files.

..

   |image2|

Figure 20: Building the application

6. Click on the RUN icon in Extension window. This will launch make and
   generates the out directory inside the application directory along
   with the ELF files.

..

   |image3|

Figure 21: Out directory generation - Terminal window
